author: Michael
title: Amad Diallo powers Manchester United level with Southampton | Premier League | NBC Sports
text:
Manchester United are back on level terms with the Saints thanks to Amad Diallo’s persistence from close range to make it 1-1 at Old Trafford. #NBCSports #PremierLeague #ManchesterUnited

With live multi-platform coverage of all 380 games, analysis from best-in-class talent and extensive surrounding coverage all week long, NBC Sports Group has become the ultimate destination for new and existing Premier League fans.
